## Open Data Files

We need to load the files we want to work with.

```{r getdata}
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

tmp <- read_csv("eligible.csv")
eligile <- tbl_df("tmp")
rm(tmp)
```
